attributes.action: Change the Acton Town Station zebra pedestrian crossings to Pelican Crossing.
attributes.background: The zebra pedestrian crossings at Acton Town Underground station are hazardously close to the roundabout (Gunnersbury-Bollo) .The additional wait for vehicles exiting the roundabout results in deadlock and pressures them to move swiftly with limited view, thereby becoming a hazard to pedestrians.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
